text: Richard Gil Kerlikowske (born November 23, 1949) is a former Commissioner of U.S. Customs and Border Protection. He assumed office on March 6, 2014 and retired January 20, 2017. He also served as the Director of the Office of National Drug Control Policy between 2009 and 2014. Kerlikowske was not in favor of the legalization of cannabis.California marijuana legalization goes up in smoke. Reuters. Retrieved on 2010-12-22.
